title: React Component Generator
content:
Generate a fully functional React component with TypeScript that includes:

Component name: [ComponentName]
Props: [List required props with types]
Features:
- Proper TypeScript typing
- Responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Accessibility features (ARIA labels, keyboard navigation)
- Error handling
- Loading states
- Proper documentation with JSDoc comments

Include example usage and unit test suggestions.
description: Generate complete React components with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and best practices
author: PromptVault Team
usageNotes: Customize the component requirements based on your specific needs.
